short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power-up your Polytoria experience with Poly+! Created by Index.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Poly+ is a quality-of-life extension to improve your experience on Polytoria!
> Created by Index with the help of several beta testers: datastore, Emir, InsertSoda, and qwp

Get started by customizing your experience on the settings page which can be accessed by:
- Clicking the extension icon in the browser toolbar (recommended)
- Going to https://polytoria.com/my/settings/polyplus
- Clicking "Poly+" on the sidebar in account settings

---
Until July 14th, you can enable a limited-time setting for Polytoria's "The Great Divide" 2024 event.

Features currently include:
- "Potentially Unbalanced" indicator in server list
- User Statistics tab on profiles

& 2 more features coming soon!
* some features use dargy's (on Polytoria) public API! thank you!
